rev.comment: re-added section, using my own words to avoid copyright violation
rev.diff:
Line 62: Line 62:
===TouchSmart tx2z===
===TouchSmart tx2z===
Released in December 2008, the [[HP Touchsmart tx2 Series|TouchSmart tx2]] was touted as the first consumer notebook and tablet PC with on-screen [[multi-touch]] control. The TouchSmart tx2 replaced the older [[HP Pavilion (computer)|HP Pavilion]] [[HP Pavilion TX1000 Series Tablet PC |tx]] series.<ref>{{cite web |url= http://www.notebookreview.com/default.asp?newsID=4741|title= HP TouchSmart tx2 Review|accessdate=January 28, 2009 |last= Jackson|first= Jerry|date= 22 December 2008|publisher=www.notebookreview.com}}</ref>
Released in December 2008, the [[HP Touchsmart tx2 Series|TouchSmart tx2]] was touted as the first consumer notebook and tablet PC with on-screen [[multi-touch]] control. The TouchSmart tx2 replaced the older [[HP Pavilion (computer)|HP Pavilion]] [[HP Pavilion TX1000 Series Tablet PC |tx]] series.<ref>{{cite web |url= http://www.notebookreview.com/default.asp?newsID=4741|title= HP TouchSmart tx2 Review|accessdate=January 28, 2009 |last= Jackson|first= Jerry|date= 22 December 2008|publisher=www.notebookreview.com}}</ref>
  +   +
===TouchSmart tm2===
  +
{expand{}}
  +
[[File:HP tm2 laptop.jpg|thumb|right|HP tm2 laptop in slate mode]]
  +
The HP TouchSmart tm2 is a convertible laptop, with a multi-touch touch-screen. Converted into slate mode, the tm2 allows artists to draw using the included digital pen and also allows students to take notes in classes.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.hp.com/united-states/personal_again/press/touch_mini_pr.pdf|title=HP Unveils Touch-enabled Notebook and Minis in Stylish Designs}}</ref>
===TouchSmart Mini 5102===
===TouchSmart Mini 5102===
